text: @joncoopertweets I want them to sigh :” Do not treat me if  COVID19 “ letter. Seriously, they want to reopen, they want to go back to normal,they shouldn’t be given ICU beds,and ventilators. Give them Trump’s favorite drug and send them home when they get sick.
